scripts.test:react: npm run build -- -w | npx babel -w ./test/renderer/react/app.js -o ./test/renderer/react/_app.js --presets=es2015,react | npx webpack --watch --mode development --entry ./test/renderer/react/_app.js --output ./test/renderer/react/_bundle.js
scripts.test:html: npm run build -- -w | npx babel -w ./test/renderer/html/index.js -o ./test/renderer/html/_index.js --presets=es2015 | npx webpack --watch --mode development --entry ./test/renderer/html/_index.js --output ./test/renderer/html/_bundle.js
